name: Entertain My Alien Guests, I'll Be Right Back
name_original: Entertain My Alien Guests, I'll Be Right Back
description:
Your alien friend has invited you to their party! But just as you arrive, they need to step out for a little bit - can you please keep everyone entertained somehow? Assign the guests to places that will fulfill their needs, tap objects to change what they do, and hope for the best! When all else fails, send folks to the bummer couches to chill a little, or send a lucky alien to the Happy Place!

  • brb - 2 minute game
  • bbl - 5 minute game
  • bye - endless mode

Made during Train Jam 2017!
